start.text: Greetings, traveler. You have the look of someone who has seen much of this broken world.

choices.text: I'm just trying to get by.
[Investigation] I've found some strange relics in my travels. Perhaps you know what they are?

neutral_response.text: Indeed. The world is full of stories. Most of them sad.

positive_response.text: Aren't we all. But there is still hope, if you know where to look.

hostile_response.text: Perhaps not. But I know a troubled soul when I see one.

investigation_success.text: Ah, yes. These are from the Before Times. They hold great power, and great danger. You would be wise to be careful with them.

choices.text: I will. Thank you for the warning.
